metadata.title: CVE-2024-46776 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Run DC_LOG_DC after checking link->link_enc[WHAT]The DC_LOG_DC should be run after link->link_enc is checked, not before.This fixes 1 REVERSE_INULL issue reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
